name: Winner
description: Win the game for the first time

name: Tree Hugger
description: Do not lose any environmental health for 5 turns in a row

name: Happy Town
description: Max out the population happiness metric

name: Captain Planet
description: Max out the environment health metric

name: All Rounder
description: Reach X in all 3 metrics at any one time

name: Clutch Gamer
description: Beat the game with a dangerously low score
